author: Fred Fleitz
title: Fred Fleitz: After coronavirus pandemic ends, investigations must review responses by China, US and others
description: While work to find treatments and a vaccine to protect us from the coronavirus accelerates around the world – and as we sadly see a growing number of hospitalizations and deaths caused by the virus – it’s not too early to plan how to review the American and i…
